content: crochet rectangle basket with handles pattern crochet basket 5 high x 15 long x 6 wide so versatile at this size uses super bulky yarn for added firmness perfect size for many uses ideal size to hold toilet paper rolls in style finally a chic crochet pattern for the bathroom works beautifully with farmhouse style decor country decor or any home style perfect for a unique crochet housewarming or crochet teacher gift fill with additional goodies for an extra special gift best for the intermediate crocheter as the center single_crochet and reverse single_crochet crab stitch take a little practice a beginner looking for a little more interesting project can certainly try this this pattern comes with clear instructions and lots of detailed photos someone who worked the project here indicated a mistake with number of row the pattern is correct trust the pattern
